basic_info.name: GVPCE Visakhapatnam Admission
description: It offers Bachelor of Technology courses with duration of 4 years. The total number of seats varies depending upon the specialization. The institute also offers a 3-year part-time B.Tech. course in Chemical Engineering. It offers PG courses in M.Tech. and MCA with the durations of 2 years and 3 years respectively.
Various courses accept different entrance exams: EAMCET for B.Tech.; GATE for M.Tech.; and ICET for MCA. All applications are invited in online mode.

Section.name: About GVPCE
Section.description:
GVP College of Engineering, Visakhapatnam started in 1996, has very quickly established itself as one of the most-preferred private engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh. College has been accredited by NAAC in 2009 with an A grade and has been sanctioned “Autonomous” status by the UGC.
GVP College of Engineering has 7 UG Programs, 13 PG Programs and 8 Departments were recognized as Research Centers by the affiliated University, JNTU-K, Kakinada. All the seven UG programs are accredited by NBA and five of them are accredited as per Outcome Based Education (OBE) and five PG programs are applied for NBA as per OBE.
GVP College of Engineering is Partner with Government of Andhra Pradesh and government of Germany (GTZ) in establishing and managing the Indo-German Institute of Advanced Technology, Visakhapatnam since 2005. Out of a total faculty strength of 280, 70 are Ph.Ds and 207 are with PG, 34 of the faculty are currently registered for Ph.Ds, 29 of them as guides/co-guides.
It offers 4 years of UG B.Tech. programs in 7 specialized branches. The college offers PG courses like MCA program and M.Tech. M.Tech. is offered in 7 departments. The detailed structure of the courses is mentioned below:
Computer Science and Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electrical And Electronics Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Information Technology, Civil Engineering, Robotics, Data Sciences, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
​Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Information Technology, Civil Engineering, Robotics Engineering, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
Cad/ Cam, Computer Science And Engineering, Infrastructure Engineering And Construction Management, Thermal Engineering, Vlsi Design & Embedded System, Power Electronics And Drives, Power System & Automation, Structural Engineering, Communication Engineering And Signal Processing
Computer Applications
